name: Facepalm
body:
# Facepalm
Learning by mistake postmortems

## Work in progress.

## Mission
This site aims to become a compilation of javascript facepalm confessions.

## Rules
The only one rule for now is that your story must be in first person. 
Other people mistakes are good for irony and tangential learning.

I whant this site to be a place to laugh of ourselves as we learn of our own mistakes.

Hopefully this will make new commers more confident by knowing that we are all humans after all.

## Contributing
Just send a PR adding a link to your ashamming story.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
